DOC.detailed_description: Purpose : examine feasibility , tolerability , utilization , effectiveness use SupportTeam mobile application context Cognitive Behavioral Therapy ( CBT ) veterans PTSD . Participants : ( N=100 ) 50 veteran serve military since October 2001 PTSD anger problem ; 50 collateral family members/close friend age 18 . Procedures ( method ) : All Veterans PTSD receive 12 session standard CBT anger . Veterans intervention group additionally receive instruction use SupportTeam family member friend provide data CBT clinician . Veterans control group receive CBT session , receive SupportTeam mobile application .
DOC.criteria: For Veteran : Age 18 old Served branch US military since October , 2001 Meets DSM5 criterion current PTSD measure ClinicianAdministered PTSD Scale DSM5 ( CAPS5 ) ; Reports least one episode anger irritability past week ; Has regularly use iOS ( iPhone 5 high iOS 8 high ) Android ( 4G network Android 4.1 high ) smartphone data plan ; Has family member friend also use smartphone data plan agree participate study . Is able willing attend 12 weekly session Duke Psychiatry office within normal business hour ( MF 8:005:00 ) For Collateral : 18 year old old Has regularly use iOS ( iPhone 5 high iOS 8 high ) Android ( 4G network Android 4.1 high ) smartphone data plan ; Has family member friend meet veteran inclusion criterion agree participate study . Exclusion Criteria , Veteran : Is currently participate , schedule participate manualized psychosocial treatment .
